String.string:
Submit all requests and questions to our support site via http://support.tera-europe.com. Be as specific as possible regarding your question or issue and include the email address associated with your account.
To edit specific account information, please include other identifying information such as your first and last name and date of birth.
The "contact support" button below will take you directly to our support site.

Problems we want to know about: vulgar language, spamming, or harassment toward you or someone else; botting or hacking; soliciting items, gold, or in-game services for real money; inappropriate character or guild names or images.
There are three ways you can report a player to customer support: 1) Click on the player and select "Report", 2) In chat, click on the player's name and select "Report", and 3) On post messages, click on the "Report Player" button located on header of the mail you receive.

Whether your character is stuck, your game is glitched, or you just need help, it's not a problem. Every one of our Customer Support agents at http://support.tera-europe.com is a GM. As gamers, we know bouncing from person to person can be frustrating, especially if none of them are actually authorized to solve your problem. That won't happen here; all our agents can resolve any issue, from billing to tech to GM help.
The "contact support" button below will take you directly to our support site.

If you think you've found a bug in TERA, we want to know immediately. Please submit all bugs at http://support.tera-europe.com, and be sure to include the following information: • Server and character name • A detailed description—what exactly is happening? • Reproduction steps—how can we find the bug? • Location in game—where were you? • Other helpful information (if applicable)—name of the NPC, mob, town, skill, item, etc. Does the bug occur every time, or only sometimes? The more information, the better. • For technical bugs, include your system specs (ex: dx diag report output). If you're not sure it's a technical bug, go ahead and include this information.
The "contact support" button below will take you directly to our support site.

Are you still here? Why aren't you playing TERA?
If you can't play, customer service is here for you. Otherwise, close this window and get back to the game!
